get.description:
A list of portal skins that contain page-level layout and presentation
customizations to be applied to Central NAC portals (e.g. MPSK provisioning,
or captive portals).

post.description:
A portal skin profile contains page-level layout and presentation
customizations to be applied to Central NAC portals (e.g. MPSK provisioning,
or captive portals).

parameters.name: skinId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the portal skin profile (must be a UUID).

get.description:
A portal skin profile contains page-level layout and presentation
customizations to be applied to Central NAC portals (e.g. MPSK provisioning,
or captive portals).

parameters.name: skinId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the portal skin profile (must be a UUID).

patch.description:
A portal skin profile contains page-level layout and presentation
customizations to be applied to Central NAC portals (e.g. MPSK provisioning,
or captive portals).

parameters.name: skinId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the portal skin profile (must be a UUID).

delete.description:
A portal skin profile contains page-level layout and presentation
customizations to be applied to Central NAC portals (e.g. MPSK provisioning,
or captive portals).

parameters.name: skinId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the portal skin profile (must be a UUID).

delete_object_type.name: object_type
delete_object_type.description: LOCAL - To delete local objects. SHARED - To delete shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

delete_scope_id.name: scope_id
delete_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

delete_persona.name: persona
delete_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_object_type.name: object_type
post_object_type.description: LOCAL - To create local objects. SHARED - To create shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

post_scope_id.name: scope_id
post_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_persona.name: persona
post_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_object_type.name: object_type
patch_object_type.description: LOCAL - To update local objects. SHARED - To update shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

patch_scope_id.name: scope_id
patch_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_persona.name: persona
patch_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

get_object_type.name: object_type
get_object_type.description: Retrieves LOCAL or SHARED or both(default) configuration objects.

get_scope_id.name: scope_id
get_scope_id.description: Configuration at a given scope. Mandatory for view_type = LOCAL.

get_persona.name: persona
get_persona.description: Filters configuration specific to given persona type. If not provided and view_type = LOCAL, then defaults to all persona.

effective.name: effective
effective.description: True - Returns effective configuration (i.e hierarchically merged configuration). False - Returns committed configuration at a given scope.

detailed.name: detailed
detailed.description: True - Includes annotations in the returned json to indicate the type of object, scope, and persona. False - Returns only config objects without annotations.

view_type.name: view_type
view_type.description: LIBRARY - Returns shared objects in library. For LIBRARY, all other parameters listed below, except 'detailed' , will be ignored. LOCAL - Returns configurations for a scope and one or more persona based on parameters below.

schema.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

schema.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

ArubaCdaPortalSkinProfile_SkinsSchema.description:
A list of portal skins that contain page-level layout and presentation
customizations to be applied to Central NAC portals (e.g. MPSK provisioning,
or captive portals).

skin.description:
A portal skin profile contains page-level layout and presentation
customizations to be applied to Central NAC portals (e.g. MPSK provisioning,
or captive portals).

skin-id.description: Unique identifier for the portal skin profile (must be a UUID).

name.description: Unique name for the portal skin profile.

description.description: A description, or note, for the portal skin profile.

background-color.x-typeDescription:
A numerical CSS Color (Module Level 3).

Supported formats include:

#rgb             3 hex digit format

#rrggbb          6 hex digit format

rgb(r,g,b)       RGB functional notation with either 3 integers, or
                3 percentages

rgba(r,g,b,a)    RGBA functional notation with RGB values as per
                rgb(), and a 4th alpha-value

hsl(h,s,l):      HSL functional notation with H (hue) as either an
                integer (0 to 360) or a percentage, and
                S (saturation) and L (lightness) as percentages

hsla(h,s,l,a):   HSL functional notation with HSL values as per
                hsl(), and a 4th alpha-value

NOTE: alpha-values are only supported as floating point values,
        which should be in the range 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0
        (fully opaque).
background-color.description: The CSS color to apply to the background of the page

background-image.description:
The image to apply to the background of the page.

The UUID for this image must be a valid Central NAC image file identifier.

See the Central NAC image upload API for further details.

brand-image.description:
The logo shown at the top of the page.

The UUID for this image must be a valid Central NAC image file identifier.

See the Central NAC image upload API for further details.

brand-link.x-typeDescription:
An ASCII-encoded Uniform Resource Locator (URL) as defined
in RFC 3986, section 1.1.3
brand-link.description: The URL to link the logo image to

x-enumDescriptions.LEFT: Align the brand (title and image) to the left of the page
x-enumDescriptions.CENTER: Align the brand (title and image) to the center of the page
x-enumDescriptions.RIGHT: Align the brand (title and image) to the right of the page

brand-location.x-typeDescription: How the branding (title and image) should be aligned
brand-location.description: How the branding (title and image) should be aligned

brand-title.description: The title, typically a company name, to show at the top of the page

content-background-color.x-typeDescription:
A numerical CSS Color (Module Level 3).

Supported formats include:

#rgb             3 hex digit format

#rrggbb          6 hex digit format

rgb(r,g,b)       RGB functional notation with either 3 integers, or
                3 percentages

rgba(r,g,b,a)    RGBA functional notation with RGB values as per
                rgb(), and a 4th alpha-value

hsl(h,s,l):      HSL functional notation with H (hue) as either an
                integer (0 to 360) or a percentage, and
                S (saturation) and L (lightness) as percentages

hsla(h,s,l,a):   HSL functional notation with HSL values as per
                hsl(), and a 4th alpha-value

NOTE: alpha-values are only supported as floating point values,
        which should be in the range 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0
        (fully opaque).
content-background-color.description: The CSS color to apply to the background of the content

favicon-image.description:
The image to use as the favicon for the page.

The UUID for this image must be a valid Central NAC image file identifier.

See the Central NAC image upload API for further details.

header-background-color.x-typeDescription:
A numerical CSS Color (Module Level 3).

Supported formats include:

#rgb             3 hex digit format

#rrggbb          6 hex digit format

rgb(r,g,b)       RGB functional notation with either 3 integers, or
                3 percentages

rgba(r,g,b,a)    RGBA functional notation with RGB values as per
                rgb(), and a 4th alpha-value

hsl(h,s,l):      HSL functional notation with H (hue) as either an
                integer (0 to 360) or a percentage, and
                S (saturation) and L (lightness) as percentages

hsla(h,s,l,a):   HSL functional notation with HSL values as per
                hsl(), and a 4th alpha-value

NOTE: alpha-values are only supported as floating point values,
        which should be in the range 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0
        (fully opaque).
header-background-color.description: The CSS color to apply to the background of the header

max-columns.description: The maximum number of columns to show on the page (any given page may use less depending on the content and size of the screen)

primary-color.x-typeDescription:
A numerical CSS Color (Module Level 3).

Supported formats include:

#rgb             3 hex digit format

#rrggbb          6 hex digit format

rgb(r,g,b)       RGB functional notation with either 3 integers, or
                3 percentages

rgba(r,g,b,a)    RGBA functional notation with RGB values as per
                rgb(), and a 4th alpha-value

hsl(h,s,l):      HSL functional notation with H (hue) as either an
                integer (0 to 360) or a percentage, and
                S (saturation) and L (lightness) as percentages

hsla(h,s,l,a):   HSL functional notation with HSL values as per
                hsl(), and a 4th alpha-value

NOTE: alpha-values are only supported as floating point values,
        which should be in the range 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0
        (fully opaque).
primary-color.description: The primary CSS color to use on the page

show-header.description: Show a header at the top of the page

x-enumDescriptions.LIGHT:
Display social network branding accordingly for a page with a 'light' theme.

Use this option when your portal pages have a light background.
x-enumDescriptions.DARK:
Display social network branding accordingly for a page with a 'dark' theme.

Use this option when your portal pages have a dark background.

social-login-branding.x-typeDescription: Social network providers login button branding
social-login-branding.description: Social network providers login button branding

x-enumDescriptions.LEFT: Set the default text alignment to 'left' for elements on a portal page.
x-enumDescriptions.CENTER: Set the default text alignment to 'center' for elements on a portal page.
x-enumDescriptions.RIGHT: Set the default text alignment to 'right' for elements on a portal page.

text-alignment.x-typeDescription: Default text alignment for elements on the page
text-alignment.description: Default text alignment for elements on the page

text-color.x-typeDescription:
A numerical CSS Color (Module Level 3).

Supported formats include:

#rgb             3 hex digit format

#rrggbb          6 hex digit format

rgb(r,g,b)       RGB functional notation with either 3 integers, or
                3 percentages

rgba(r,g,b,a)    RGBA functional notation with RGB values as per
                rgb(), and a 4th alpha-value

hsl(h,s,l):      HSL functional notation with H (hue) as either an
                integer (0 to 360) or a percentage, and
                S (saturation) and L (lightness) as percentages

hsla(h,s,l,a):   HSL functional notation with HSL values as per
                hsl(), and a 4th alpha-value

NOTE: alpha-values are only supported as floating point values,
        which should be in the range 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0

text-color.description: The CSS color to use for text

x-enumDescriptions.BG: Specify Bulgarian as the Wifi4EU portal language
x-enumDescriptions.HR: Specify Croatian as the Wifi4EU portal language
x-enumDescriptions.CS: Specify Czech as the Wifi4EU portal language

wifi4eu-language.x-typeDescription: An ISO 639 language code for the Wifi4EU background image.
wifi4eu-language.description: The language to be used in the wifi4eu background image

wifi4eu-network-identifier.description: The unique identifier of the WiFi4EU network installation as indicated in the Installation Report.

ANY.description: Any of local or shared config object.

description.description: A description, or note, for the portal skin profile.

Error400.description: Error details returned from the server.

message.example: Bad request. Invalid values supplied in request.

message.example: Not found. Yang / Corresponding Rule is missing.
